body_html: I suspect there is something else in your code unrelated to pytorch versions because 14 secs to perform L=20 epochs on allcnn with cifar-10 does not look right :) On the other hand, your numbers correspond to SGD, i.e., setting L = 0.
body_text: I suspect there is something else in your code unrelated to pytorch versions because 14 secs to perform L=20 epochs on allcnn with cifar-10 does not look right :) On the other hand, your numbers correspond to SGD, i.e., setting L = 0.
body: I suspect there is something else in your code unrelated to pytorch versions because 14 secs to perform L=20 epochs on allcnn with cifar-10 does not look right :) On the other hand, your numbers correspond to SGD, i.e., setting L = 0.
